ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Madhav Ghimire has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 10 years. During his last employment he was working as an ETL Informatica Developer at Baylor Hospital. Madhav has extensive knowledge of ETL, Informatica Analytics Package > Informatica PowerCenter, Oracle, Teradata, Microsoft SQL Server, DB2, shell scripting, SQL, Perl Programming, Oracle 10G, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, Informatica Analytics Package > Informatica PowerExchange, Informatica, COBOL, XML, Tivoli/TME, Oracle Toad, Oracle 8i, Interfaces, Data Migration, Control-M, Blue. So far Madhav has not gained any managerial experience.
